feed.title: Ronal Gelvez
feed.subtitle: Welcome to the portfolio of Ronal Gelvez, an experienced .NET Developer specializing in Azure cloud solutions. Explore my projects, showcasing expertise in creating scalable, secure, and high-performance applications. With a deep understanding of .NET technologies and Azure services, I bring innovative solutions to complex problems. Let's collaborate to bring your ideas to life in the cloud.

entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: Hello there, I’m Ronal Software Developer .Net - Azure I’m passionate about technology and how it helps us to solve problems, for this reason i’m a software developer, i’m interested in continuously learning on the avant-garde tools, the techniques to improve productivity and my mainly goal is to generate knowledge. Skills .Net / .Net Core / .Net Framework / Entity Framewor...
